name: Every Second
description:
Made for the 2019 Summer #ue4jam: Make It Count

Game Description:

Think your way out of the box - use your quick-thinking to slide a way through ever more difficult puzzles in a race against the clock. This game is a mix of classic platformer and slider-puzzle style games. 

Controls:

W, S, A & D or the Arrow Keys to move.
Shift to enter/exit puzzle mode.
Spacebar to slide selected puzzle block.
